oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Chris Janson - 2017-09-23
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by singer-songwriter Chris Janson from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 23, 2017. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chris Janson;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (15:02) Abigail St. Pierre opening comments / (21:14) Chris Janson introduction from Abigail St. Pierre / (24:07) Opening comments by Chris / (26:26) Introduction of the next song / (27:23) Performs Everybody / (30:00) Talks about doing promotion for his new album / (30:55) Talks about starting to write songs in Nashville / (31:04) Introduces the next song and talks about Mitch Oglesby / 33:23() Performs Who's Your Farmer / (35:57) Talks about previous song and Mitch Oglesby / (37:02) Talks about writing songs for his current album Everybody / (38:08) Talks about the next song / (39:52) Performs Fix A Drink / (43:49) Talks about writing songs, mentions his managers, his band and talks about his faith and his family / (48:13) Performs Being A Dad / (51:32) Talks about the previous song / (51:55) Talks about liking traditional country music / (52:20) Talks about his roots / (54:16) Performs Redneck Life / (56:40) Talks about the next song /

(59:07) Performs Drunk Girl / (01:03:01) Answers question about Eric Church and being an original / (01:04:58) Answers question about his feelings for his wife and the song Holding Her / (01:06:33) Answers question about doing an album of gospel songs / (01:09:34) Answers question about finding the right words to express what he's feeling in a song and talks about what he thinks a real songwriter is / (01:12:26) Answers question about his dream partnership and co-writing / (01:14:10) Responds to compliment from and audience member / (01:14:18) Closing comments /(01:14:39) Walk-out music / (01:15:51) FILE END
